## FOR THE KIDS - CONTRIBUTION CHECKLIST

### 1. Mission Alignment
- [ ] Does this code generate revenue or improve infrastructure?
- [ ] Does this code respect the 60/30/10 Gospel?

### 2. Security Check (CRITICAL)
- [ ] I have verified there are NO API KEYS or SECRETS in this code.
- [ ] I have not touched the `api/.env` or `C:\Keys` structure.
- [ ] I have not hardcoded any credentials, tokens, or passwords.

### 3. Description
<!-- Describe what you changed and why -->


### 4. AI Audit Prep
<!-- Explain your logic simply so our AI Sentinel can verify it -->


### 5. Testing
- [ ] I have tested this locally
- [ ] Existing functionality still works

**Reminder:** PRs with exposed secrets will be instantly closed. The 60/30/10 split is immutable.
